entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low zero.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
